title: Suit: 3 abused at CPD's Homan Square facility, then illegally jailed for more than a year
text: Three people claimed in a federal lawsuit filed Monday that they were abused by Chicago Police officers at the departmentâ€™s Homan Square facility on the West Side , and then illegally jailed for more than a year. Atheris Mann , Jessie Patrick
